sqlMap.select: SELECT MENU_ID ID, OWN_MENU_ID PID, MENU_NAME TEXT, LINK_URL URL, MENU_ICON ICON, MENU_SEQ FROM T01_SYS_MENU WHERE STATUS = 1 order by OWN_MENU_ID ,MENU_SEQ
select MENU_NAME from T01_SYS_MENU where menu_id = #menuId#

select t1.menu_id menuId, t1.own_menu_id ownMenuId, t1.menu_name menuName, t1.menu_desc menuDesc, t1.link_url linkUrl, t1.menu_icon menuIcon, t2.menu_name ownMenuName, t1.MENU_SEQ seqNum from t01_sys_menu t1, t01_sys_menu t2 where t1.own_menu_id = t2.menu_id and t1.menu_id = #menuId#
sqlMap.update: update t01_sys_menu set menu_name = #menuName#, menu_desc = #menuDesc#, MENU_ICON = #menuIcon#, link_url = #linkUrl#, MENU_SEQ = #seqNum# where menu_id = #menuId#
